senselogic.sitevision.api.security

Interface AuthenticationUtil


  • @Requireable(value="AuthenticationUtil")
public interface AuthenticationUtil

    Authentication utility interface.

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via Utils.getAuthenticationUtil(). See Utils for how to obtain an instance of the Utils interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 2.6.1_03, Sitevision 2.7_01
    Author:
    Mikael Wikblom

    • Method Detail

      • logout

        void logout(HttpServletRequest aServletRequest,
            boolean invalidateHttpSession)
        Logout current user based on a HttpServletRequest.
        Parameters:
        aServletRequest - the current servlet request
        invalidateHttpSession - whether or not the session should be invalidated. This is normally not the case

      • logout

        void logout(PortletRequest aPortletRequest,
            boolean invalidateHttpSession)
        Logout current user based on a PortletRequest.
        Parameters:
        aPortletRequest - the current portlet request
        invalidateHttpSession - whether or not the session should be invalidated. This is normally not the case

      • login

        void login(HttpServletRequest aServletRequest,
           Map<String,String> sharedState)
    throws LoginException
        Authenticates a user based on a shared state map.
        Parameters:
        aServletRequest - the current servlet request
        sharedState - a map containing "javax.security.auth.login.name" and "javax.security.auth.login.password"
        Throws:
        LoginException - if login fails
        Since:
        Sitevision 2.6.2_06

      • login

        void login(HttpServletRequest aServletRequest,
           String name,
           String password)
    throws LoginException
        Authenticates a user based on username and password.
        Parameters:
        aServletRequest - the current servlet request
        name - a username
        password - a password
        Throws:
        LoginException - if login fails
        Since:
        Sitevision 2.6.2_06

      • reLogin

        void reLogin(HttpServletRequest aServletRequest)
      throws LoginException
        Re-authenticates a user based on a Subject already in the session.
        Parameters:
        aServletRequest - the current servlet request
        Throws:
        LoginException - if login fails
        Since:
        Sitevision 2.6.2_06

      • login

        void login(PortletRequest aPortletRequest,
           Map<String,String> sharedState)
    throws LoginException
        Authenticates a user based on a shared state map.
        Parameters:
        aPortletRequest - the current portlet request
        sharedState - a map containing "javax.security.auth.login.name" and "javax.security.auth.login.password"
        Throws:
        LoginException - if login fails
        Since:
        Sitevision 2.6.2_06

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).

Copyright© 2008-2025 Sitevision AB, all rights reserved.
